  <description>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_89427</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Le cycle de vie d'une plante de pois</string>
            <string language="en">The life cycle of a pea plant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Lebenszyklus eines Erbse Betriebes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ciclo de vida de uma planta da ervilha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il ciclo di vita di una pianta dei piselli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κύκλος ζωής εγκαταστάσεων μπιζελιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ciclo vital de una planta del guisante</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Seconde dans une série de six illustrations montrant les étapes de la vie d'une plante de pois. Montré ici  est un insecte visitant une fleur épanouie de plante de pois.</string>
            <string language="en">Second in a series of six illustrations showing the life stages of a pea plant. Shown here is an insect visiting an open flower of the pea plant.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fleurs</string>
            <string language="en">flowers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">insectes</string>
            <string language="en">insects</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cycle de vie</string>
            <string language="en">life cycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pois</string>
            <string language="en">pea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plantes</string>
            <string language="en">Plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pollinisation</string>
            <string language="en">pollination</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle in einer Reihe von sechs 
Abbildungen, welche die Lebenstadien eines Erbse Betriebes zeigen. 
Hier gezeigt ein Insekt, das eine geöffnete Blume des Erbse 
Betriebes besucht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo em uma série de seis ilustrações 
que mostram os estágios da vida de uma planta da ervilha. É 
mostrado aqui um inseto que visita uma flor aberta da planta da 
ervilha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo in serie di sei illustrazioni 
che mostrano le fasi di vita di una pianta dei piselli. È 
indicato qui un insetto che visita un fiore aperto della pianta dei 
piselli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερος σε μία σειρά έξι απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν στάδια ζωής εγκαταστάσεων μπιζελιών. 
Εμφανισμένο εδώ είναι ένα έντομο επισκεμμένος ένα 
ανοικτό λουλούδι των εγκαταστάσεων μπιζελιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar en una serie de seis 
ilustraciones que muestran las etapas de la vida de una planta del 
guisante. Se muestra aquí un insecto que visita una flor 
abierta de la planta del guisante.</string>
          </description>
